channel.title: Barrows MiniGame
channel.description:
I tried using the barrows minigame tuts but all they did is screw up my server in odd ways. The only thing I actually need right now is to make it so that After you kill a barrows brother, You will automaticly teleport to the next tomb. I really don't want to have to have to pick up something and use it with a spade and all that jazz. Anyone got a code or a way to have a working barrows?
Thanks, Play For Keeps
P.S. Sorry for the second topic on this board, I just wanna get this server perfected.

item.title: Barrows MiniGame
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

well if you already have a method to get to the first barrows tomb, and you have coords of all the places, you can probably add something like this to NPCHandler

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2025) { //ahrim
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
ppl.teleportToX = [xcoord];
ppl.teleportToY = [ycoord];
}

I dont think that would work but you can try it

also you could make the brothers drop different items and when you pick up that item you are teleported to a certain place and then the item is deleted so you can move again

Read full topic
